lessons.japanese: その警官は私に対してかなりぞんざいだった。
lessons.english: The policeman was rather abrupt with me.

lessons.japanese: 彼は引き出しに物をぞんざいに押し込んだ。
lessons.english: He put his things carelessly in the drawer.
